summary: Replacer textures for the Nightingale male armor themed after the Clavicus Vile Mask
descriptionHtml:
-=:WARNING:=-
-This is NOT compatible with any replacer texture that deals with Clavicus Vile's mask or the male Nightingale armour.. Unfortunately i do not have the necessary resources or knowledge to fix this (in order to offer it as a standalone armor).

-This is a replacer not a new set of armour...that means the Nightingale Armour is still classified as Light Armour.. Unfortunately i do not have the necessary resources or knowledge to fix this (in order for the helmet to match the rest of the set).

-These items might or might not be craftable in your game depending on the mods you have installed...

All textures are 1024x1024


*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete "clavicus_vile_mask_d.dds" from ...\Data\textures\clothes\clavicusvilemask and nightingalearmorbodym.dds, nightingalearmorbootsm.dds and nightingalearmorglovesm.dds from ...\Data\textures\armor\nightingale\m

*****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is allowed when proper credit is provided
*****************************************************************************
